   19: %%
   20: -module(unicode_util_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: 
   24: -export([all/0, suite/0, extra/1,
   25:          uppercase/1, lowercase/1, titlecase/1, casefold/1,
   26:          cp/1, gc/1,
   27:          nfd/1, nfc/1, nfkd/1, nfkc/1,
   28:          whitespace/1,
   29:          get/1,
   30:          count/1]).
   31: 
   32: -export([debug/0, id/1, bin_split/1, uc_loaded_size/0,
   33:         time_count/4  %% Used by stdlib_bench_SUITE
   34:         ]).
   35: 
   36: suite() ->
   37:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   38:      {timetrap,{minutes,20}}].
   39: 
   40: all() ->
   41:     [
   42:      extra,
   43:      uppercase, lowercase, titlecase, casefold,
   44:      cp, gc,
   45:      nfd, nfc, nfkd, nfkc,
   46:      whitespace,
   47:      get,
   48:      count
   49:     ].
   50: 
   51: debug() ->
   52:     Config = [{data_dir, ?MODULE_STRING++"_data"}],
   53:     [io:format("~p:~p~n",[Test,?MODULE:Test(Config)]) || Test <- all()].
   54: 
   55: extra(_) ->
   56:     {_, _} = unicode_util:spec_version(),
   57:     #{ccc:=0, compat:=[], canon:=[_,_]} = unicode_util:lookup($å),
   58:     #{fold:=229,lower:=229,title:=197,upper:=197} = unicode_util:get_case($å),
   59:     #{fold:="ss",lower:=223,title:="Ss",upper:="SS"} = unicode_util:get_case($ß),
   60:     ok.
   61: 
   62: uppercase(_) ->
   63:     [$H] = unicode_util:uppercase([$H]),
   64:     [$H] = unicode_util:uppercase([$h]),
   65:     [$1] = unicode_util:uppercase([$1]),
   66:     ok.
   67: 
   68: titlecase(_) ->
   69:     [$H] = unicode_util:titlecase([$H]),
   70:     [$H] = unicode_util:titlecase([$h]),
   71:     [$1] = unicode_util:titlecase([$1]),
   72:     ok.
   73: 
   74: lowercase(_) ->
   75:     [$h] = unicode_util:lowercase([$H]),
   76:     [$h] = unicode_util:lowercase([$h]),
   77:     [$1] = unicode_util:lowercase([$1]),
   78:     [$i] = unicode_util:casefold([$I]), %% no Turkish
   79:     ok.
   80: 
   81: casefold(_) ->
   82:     [$h] = unicode_util:casefold([$H]),
   83:     [$h] = unicode_util:casefold([$h]),
   84:     [$1] = unicode_util:casefold([$1]),
   85:     [$i] = unicode_util:casefold([$I]),%% no Turkish
   86:     [[$s,$s]|"abC"] = unicode_util:casefold([$ß,$a,$b,$C]),
   87:     [[$s,$s]] = unicode_util:casefold([$ẞ]),
   88:     ok.
   89: 
   90: whitespace(_) ->
   91:     WS = unicode_util:whitespace(),
   92:     WS = lists:filter(fun unicode_util:is_whitespace/1, WS),
   93:     %% TODO add more tests
   94:     ok.
   95: 
   96: cp(_) ->
   97:     Get = fun unicode_util:cp/1,
   98:     "hejsan" = fetch("hejsan", Get),
   99:     "hejsan" = fetch(<<"hejsan">>, Get),
  100:     "hejsan" = fetch(["hej",<<"san">>], Get),
  101:     "hejsan" = fetch(["hej"|<<"san">>], Get),
  102:     {error, <<128>>} = Get(<<128>>),
  103:     {error, [<<128>>, 0]} = Get([<<128>>, 0]),
  104:     ok.
  105: 
  106: gc(Config) ->
  107:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  108:     Get = fun unicode_util:gc/1,
  109:     "hejsan" = fetch("hejsan", Get),
  110:     "hejsan" = fetch(<<"hejsan">>, Get),
  111:     "hejsan" = fetch(["hej",<<"san">>], Get),
  112:     "hejsan" = fetch(["hej"|<<"san">>], Get),
  113:     {error, <<128>>} = Get(<<128>>),
  114:     {error, [<<128>>, 0]} = Get([<<128>>, 0]),
  115: 
  116:     0 = fold(fun verify_gc/3, 0, DataDir ++ "/GraphemeBreakTest.txt"),
  117:     ok.
  118: 
  119: verify_gc(Line0, N, Acc) ->
  120:     Line = unicode:characters_to_list(Line0),
  121:     Line = fetch(Line0,fun unicode_util:cp/1), %% Test cp
  122:     LineGC = fetch(Line0,fun unicode_util:gc/1), %% Test gc
  123:     LineGC = fetch(Line,fun unicode_util:gc/1), %% Test gc
  124:     LineGC = fetch(LineGC,fun unicode_util:gc/1), %% Test gc
  125:     LineGC = fetch(LineGC,fun unicode_util:cp/1), %% Test cp
  126: 
  127:     %io:format("Line: ~s~n",[Line]),
  128:     [Data|_Comments] = string:tokens(Line, "#"),
  129:     %% io:format("Data: ~w~n",[string:tokens(Data, " \t")]),
  130:     {Str,Res} = gc_test_data(string:tokens(Data, " \t"), [], [[]]),
  131:     %% io:format("InputStr: ~w ~w~n",[Str,unicode:characters_to_binary(Str)]),
  132:     case verify_gc(Str, Res, N, Line) andalso
  133:         verify_gc(unicode:characters_to_binary(Str), Res, N, Line0) of
  134:         true -> Acc;
  135:         false -> Acc+1
  136:     end.
  137: 
  138: verify_gc({error,_,[CP|_]}=Err, _Res, N, Line) ->
  139:     IsSurrogate = 16#D800 =< CP andalso CP =< 16#DFFF,
  140:     %% Surrogat is not valid in utf8 encoding only utf16
  141:     IsSurrogate orelse
  142:         io:format("~w: ~ts~n Error in unicode:characters_to_binary ~w~n", [N, Line, Err]),
  143:     IsSurrogate;
  144: verify_gc(Str, Res, N, Line) ->
  145:     try fetch(Str, fun unicode_util:gc/1) of
  146:         Res -> true;
  147:         Other ->
  148:             io:format("Failed: ~p~nInput: ~ts~n\t=> ~w |~ts|~n",[N, Line, Str, Str]),
  149:             io:format("Expected: ~p~n", [Res]),
  150:             io:format("Got: ~w~n", [Other]),
  151:             false
  152:     catch Cl:R:Stacktrace ->
  153:             io:format("~p: ~ts => |~tp|~n",[N, Line, Str]),
  154:             io:format("Expected: ~p~n", [Res]),
  155:             erlang:raise(Cl,R,Stacktrace)
  156:     end.
  157: 
  158: gc_test_data([[247]|Rest], Str, [First|GCs]) ->
  159:     case First of
  160:         [] -> gc_test_data(Rest, Str, [[]|GCs]);
  161:         [CP] -> gc_test_data(Rest, Str, [[],CP|GCs]);
  162:         _  -> gc_test_data(Rest, Str, [[],lists:reverse(First)|GCs])
  163:     end;
  164: gc_test_data([[215]|Rest], Str, GCs) ->
  165:     gc_test_data(Rest, Str, GCs);
  166: gc_test_data([Hex|Rest], Str, [First|GCs]) ->
  167:     CP = hex_to_int(Hex),
  168:     gc_test_data(Rest, [CP|Str], [[CP|First]|GCs]);
  169: gc_test_data([], Str, [[]|GCs]) ->
  170:     {lists:reverse(Str), lists:reverse(GCs)};
  171: gc_test_data([], Str, GCs) ->
  172:     {lists:reverse(Str), lists:reverse(GCs)}.
  173: 
  174: nfd(Config) ->
  175:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  176:     ok = fold(fun verify_nfd/3, 0, DataDir ++ "/NormalizationTest.txt"),
  177:     ok.
  178: 
  179: verify_nfd(<<"@Part", _/binary>>, _LineNo, _Acc) -> ok;
  180: verify_nfd(Data0, LineNo, _Acc) ->
  181:     Data1 = unicode:characters_to_list(Data0),
  182:     [Data2|_Comments] = string:tokens(Data1, "#"),
  183:     Columns = string:tokens(Data2, ";"),
  184:     [C1,C2,C3,C4,C5|_] = [[hex_to_int(CP) || CP <- string:tokens(C, " ")] ||
  185:                              C <- Columns],
  186:     C3GC = fetch(C3, fun unicode_util:gc/1),
  187:     try
  188:         C3GC = fetch(C1, fun unicode_util:nfd/1),
  189:         C3GC = fetch(C2, fun unicode_util:nfd/1),
  190:         C3GC = fetch(C3, fun unicode_util:nfd/1)
  191:     catch  _Cl:{badmatch, Other} = _R: Stacktrace ->
  192:             io:format("Failed: ~p~nInput: ~ts~n\t=> ~w |~ts|~n",[LineNo, Data1, C1, C1]),
  193:             io:format("Expected: ~ts ~w~n", [C3GC, C3GC]),
  194:             io:format("Got: ~ts ~w~n", [Other, Other]),
  195:             erlang:raise(_Cl,_R,Stacktrace);
  196:            Cl:R:Stacktrace ->
  197:             io:format("~p: ~ts => |~tp|~n",[LineNo, Data1, C1]),
  198:             io:format("Expected: ~p~n", [C3]),
  199:             erlang:raise(Cl,R,Stacktrace)
  200:     end,
  201:     C5GC = fetch(C5, fun unicode_util:gc/1),
  202:     try
  203:         C5GC = fetch(C4, fun unicode_util:nfd/1),
  204:         C5GC = fetch(C5, fun unicode_util:nfd/1)
  205:     catch  _Cl2:{badmatch, Other2} = _R2:Stacktrace2 ->
  206:             io:format("Failed: ~p~nInput: ~ts~n\t=> ~w |~ts|~n",[LineNo, Data1, C1, C1]),
  207:             io:format("Expected: ~ts ~w~n", [C5GC, C5GC]),
  208:             io:format("Got:      ~ts ~w~n", [Other2, Other2]),
  209:             erlang:raise(_Cl2,_R2,Stacktrace2);
  210:            Cl2:R2:Stacktrace2 ->
  211:             io:format("~p: ~ts => |~tp|~n",[LineNo, Data1, C1]),
  212:             io:format("Expected: ~p~n", [C5]),
  213:             erlang:raise(Cl2,R2,Stacktrace2)
  214:     end,
  215:     ok.
  216: 
  217: nfc(Config) ->
  218:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  219:     ok = fold(fun verify_nfc/3, 0, DataDir ++ "/NormalizationTest.txt"),
  220:     ok.
  221: 
  222: verify_nfc(<<"@Part", _/binary>>, _LineNo, _Acc) -> ok;
  223: verify_nfc(Data0, LineNo, _Acc) ->
  224:     Data1 = unicode:characters_to_list(Data0),
  225:     [Data2|_Comments] = string:tokens(Data1, "#"),
  226:     Columns = string:tokens(Data2, ";"),
  227:     [C1,C2,C3,C4,C5|_] = [[hex_to_int(CP) || CP <- string:tokens(C, " ")] ||
  228:                              C <- Columns],
  229:     C2GC = fetch(C2, fun unicode_util:gc/1),
  230:     try
  231:         C2GC = fetch(C1, fun unicode_util:nfc/1),
  232:         C2GC = fetch(C2, fun unicode_util:nfc/1),
  233:         C2GC = fetch(C3, fun unicode_util:nfc/1)
  234:     catch  _Cl:{badmatch, Other} = _R:Stacktrace ->
  235:             io:format("Failed: ~p~nInput: ~ts~n\t=> ~w |~ts|~n",[LineNo, Data1, C1, C1]),
  236:             io:format("Expected: ~ts ~w~n", [C2GC, C2GC]),
  237:             io:format("Got:      ~ts ~w~n", [Other, Other]),
  238:             erlang:raise(_Cl,_R,Stacktrace);
  239:            Cl:R:Stacktrace ->
  240:             io:format("~p: ~ts => |~tp|~n",[LineNo, Data1, C1]),
  241:             io:format("Expected: ~p~n", [C3]),
  242:             erlang:raise(Cl,R,Stacktrace)
  243:     end,
  244:     C4GC = fetch(C4, fun unicode_util:gc/1),
  245:     try
  246:         C4GC = fetch(C4, fun unicode_util:nfc/1),
  247:         C4GC = fetch(C5, fun unicode_util:nfc/1)
  248:     catch  _Cl2:{badmatch, Other2} = _R2:Stacktrace2 ->
  249:             io:format("Failed: ~p~nInput: ~ts~n\t=> ~w |~ts|~n",[LineNo, Data1, C1, C1]),
  250:             io:format("Expected: ~ts ~w~n", [C4GC, C4GC]),
  251:             io:format("Got: ~ts ~w~n", [Other2, Other2]),
  252:             erlang:raise(_Cl2,_R2,Stacktrace2);
  253:            Cl2:R2:Stacktrace2 ->
  254:             io:format("~p: ~ts => |~tp|~n",[LineNo, Data1, C1]),
  255:             io:format("Expected: ~p~n", [C5]),
  256:             erlang:raise(Cl2,R2,Stacktrace2)
  257:     end,
  258:     ok.
  259: 
  260: nfkd(Config) ->
  261:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  262:     ok = fold(fun verify_nfkd/3, 0, DataDir ++ "/NormalizationTest.txt"),
  263:     ok.
  264: 
  265: verify_nfkd(<<"@Part", _/binary>>, _LineNo, _Acc) -> ok;
  266: verify_nfkd(Data0, LineNo, _Acc) ->
  267:     Data1 = unicode:characters_to_list(Data0),
  268:     [Data2|_Comments] = string:tokens(Data1, "#"),
  269:     Columns = string:tokens(Data2, ";"),
  270:     [C1,C2,C3,C4,C5|_] = [[hex_to_int(CP) || CP <- string:tokens(C, " ")] ||
  271:                              C <- Columns],
  272:     C5GC = lists:flatten(fetch(C5, fun unicode_util:gc/1)),
  273:     try
  274:         C5GC = lists:flatten(fetch(C1, fun unicode_util:nfkd/1)),
  275:         C5GC = lists:flatten(fetch(C2, fun unicode_util:nfkd/1)),
  276:         C5GC = lists:flatten(fetch(C3, fun unicode_util:nfkd/1)),
  277:         C5GC = lists:flatten(fetch(C4, fun unicode_util:nfkd/1)),
  278:         C5GC = lists:flatten(fetch(C5, fun unicode_util:nfkd/1))
  279:     catch  _Cl:{badmatch, Other} = _R:Stacktrace ->
  280:             io:format("Failed: ~p~nInput: ~ts~n\t=> ~w |~ts|~n",[LineNo, Data1, C5, C5]),
  281:             io:format("Expected: ~ts ~w~n", [C5GC, C5GC]),
  282:             io:format("Got: ~ts ~w~n", [Other, Other]),
  283:             erlang:raise(_Cl,_R,Stacktrace);
  284:            Cl:R:Stacktrace ->
  285:             io:format("~p: ~ts => |~tp|~n",[LineNo, Data1, C1]),
  286:             io:format("Expected: ~p~n", [C3]),
  287:             erlang:raise(Cl,R,Stacktrace)
  288:     end,
  289:     ok.
  290: 
  291: 
  292: nfkc(Config) ->
  293:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  294:     ok = fold(fun verify_nfkc/3, 0, DataDir ++ "/NormalizationTest.txt"),
  295:     ok.
  296: 
  297: verify_nfkc(<<"@Part", _/binary>>, _LineNo, _Acc) -> ok;
  298: verify_nfkc(Data0, LineNo, _Acc) ->
  299:     Data1 = unicode:characters_to_list(Data0),
  300:     [Data2|_Comments] = string:tokens(Data1, "#"),
  301:     Columns = string:tokens(Data2, ";"),
  302:     [C1,C2,C3,C4,C5|_] = [[hex_to_int(CP) || CP <- string:tokens(C, " ")] ||
  303:                              C <- Columns],
  304:     C4GC = lists:flatten(fetch(C4, fun unicode_util:gc/1)),
  305:     try
  306:         C4GC = lists:flatten(fetch(C1, fun unicode_util:nfkc/1)),
  307:         C4GC = lists:flatten(fetch(C2, fun unicode_util:nfkc/1)),
  308:         C4GC = lists:flatten(fetch(C3, fun unicode_util:nfkc/1)),
  309:         C4GC = lists:flatten(fetch(C4, fun unicode_util:nfkc/1)),
  310:         C4GC = lists:flatten(fetch(C5, fun unicode_util:nfkc/1))
  311: 
  312:     catch  _Cl:{badmatch, Other} = _R:Stacktrace ->
  313:             io:format("Failed: ~p~nInput: ~ts~n\t=> ~w |~ts|~n",[LineNo, Data1, C4, C4]),
  314:             io:format("Expected: ~ts ~w~n", [C4GC, C4GC]),
  315:             io:format("Got:      ~ts ~w~n", [Other, Other]),
  316:             erlang:raise(_Cl,_R,Stacktrace);
  317:            Cl:R:Stacktrace ->
  318:             io:format("~p: ~ts => |~tp|~n",[LineNo, Data1, C1]),
  319:             io:format("Expected: ~p~n", [C3]),
  320:             erlang:raise(Cl,R,Stacktrace)
  321:     end,
  322:     ok.
  323: 
  324: get(_) ->
  325:     add_get_tests.
  326: 
  327: count(Config) ->
  328:     Parent = self(),
  329:     Exec = fun() ->
  330:                    do_measure(Config),
  331:                    Parent ! {test_done, self()}
  332:            end,
  333:     ct:timetrap({minutes,5}),
  334:     case ct:get_timetrap_info() of
  335:         {_,{_,Scale}} when Scale > 1 ->
  336:             {skip,{measurments_skipped_debug,Scale}};
  337:         _ -> % No scaling, run at most 2 min
  338:             Tester = spawn(Exec),
  339:             receive {test_done, Tester} -> ok
  340:             after 120000 ->
  341:                     io:format("Timelimit reached stopping~n",[]),
  342:                     exit(Tester, die)
  343:             end,
  344:             ok
  345:     end.
  346: 
  347: do_measure(Config) ->
  348:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  349:     File =  DataDir ++ "/NormalizationTest.txt",
  350:     {ok, Bin} = file:read_file(File),
  351:     Do = fun(Func, Mode) ->
  352:                  {N, Mean, Stddev, Res} = time_count(Func, Mode, Bin, 10),
  353:                  io:format("~4w ~6w ~.10w ~.6wms ±~.2wms #~.2w~n",
  354:                            [Func, Mode, Res, Mean div 1000, Stddev div 1000, N])
  355:          end,
  356:     Do(lref, list),
  357:     Do(bref, binary),
  358:     io:format("----------------------~n"),
  359:     [Do(What,Mode) || What <- [cp, gc, nfd, nfc, nfkd, nfkc], Mode <- [list, deep_l, binary, deep_b]],
  360:     io:format("Size of unicode_util: ~pkB~n",[uc_loaded_size() div 1024]),
  361:     ok.
  362: 
  363: uc_loaded_size() ->
  364:     uc_loaded_size(binary:split(erlang:system_info(loaded), <<$\n>>, [global])).
  365: 
  366: uc_loaded_size([<<"unicode_util ", Rest/binary>>|_]) ->
  367:     [StrSize|_] = binary:split(Rest, <<$\s>>),
  368:     binary_to_integer(StrSize);
  369: uc_loaded_size([_|Rest]) ->
  370:     uc_loaded_size(Rest).
  371: 
  372: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  373: 
  374: time_count(Fun, Mode, Bin, Repeat) ->
  375:     timer:sleep(100), %% Let emulator catch up and clean things before test runs
  376:     Self = self(),
  377:     Pid = spawn_link(fun() ->
  378:                              Str = mode(Mode, Bin),
  379:                              Self ! {self(),do_count(0,0,0, Fun, Str, undefined, Repeat)}
  380:                      end),
  381:     receive {Pid,Msg} -> Msg end.
  382: 
  383: do_count(N,Sum,SumSq, Fun, Str, _, Repeat) when N < Repeat ->
  384:     {Time, Res} = do_count(Fun, Str),
  385:     do_count(N+1,Sum+Time,SumSq+Time*Time, Fun, Str, Res, Repeat);
  386: do_count(N,Sum,SumSq, _, _, Res, _) ->
  387:     Mean = round(Sum / N),
  388:     Stdev = round(math:sqrt((SumSq - (Sum*Sum/N))/(N - 1))),
  389:     {N, Mean, Stdev, Res}.
  390: 
  391: do_count(Fun, Str) ->
  392:     Count = fun Count(Str0, N) ->
  393:                     case unicode_util:Fun(Str0) of
  394:                         [] -> N;
  395:                         [_|Str1] -> Count(Str1,N+1)
  396:                     end
  397:             end,
  398: 
  399:     if Fun =/= lref, Fun =/= bref ->
  400:             timer:tc(fun() -> Count(Str, 0) end);
  401:        true ->
  402:             Pick = case Fun of
  403:                        lref -> id(id);
  404:                        bref -> id(bin_split)
  405:                    end,
  406:             Ref = fun LR(Str0, N) ->
  407:                           case ?MODULE:Pick(Str0) of
  408:                               [] -> N;
  409:                               [_|Str1] -> LR(Str1,N+1)
  410:                           end
  411:                   end,
  412:             timer:tc(fun() -> Ref(Str, 0) end)
  413:     end.
  414: 
  415: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  416: 
  417: 
  418: id(Op) -> Op.
  419: 
  420: bin_split(<<>>) -> [];
  421: bin_split(<<CP/utf8,R/binary>>) -> [CP|R].
  422: 
  423: mode(binary, Bin) -> Bin;
  424: mode(list, Bin) -> unicode:characters_to_list(Bin);
  425: mode(deep_b, Bin) -> [Bin];
  426: mode(deep_l, Bin) -> [unicode:characters_to_list(Bin)].
  427: 
  428: fetch(Str, F) ->
  429:     case F(Str) of
  430:         [] -> [];
  431:         [CP|R] ->
  432:             %% If input is a binary R should be binary
  433:             if is_binary(Str) == false -> ok;
  434:                is_binary(R); R =:= [] -> ok;
  435:                true ->
  436:                     io:format("Char: ~tc Tail:~tP~n", [CP,R,10]),
  437:                     exit({bug, F})
  438:             end,
  439:             [CP|fetch(R,F)]
  440:     end.
  441: 
  442: %% *Test.txt file helpers
  443: 
  444: hex_to_int([]) -> [];
  445: hex_to_int(HexStr) ->
  446:     list_to_integer(string:strip(HexStr, both), 16).
  447: 
  448: fold(Fun, Acc, File) ->
  449:     io:format("Processing ~s~n",[File]),
  450:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(File, [read, raw, binary, {read_ahead, 100000}]),
  451:     Get = fun() -> file:read_line(Fd) end,
  452:     try
  453:         fold_1(Fun, 1, Acc, Get)
  454:     after
  455:         ok = file:close(Fd)
  456:     end.
  457: 
  458: fold_1(Fun, Line, Acc, Get) ->
  459:     case Get() of
  460:         eof -> Acc;
  461:         {ok, <<"#",_/binary>>} -> %% Ignore comments
  462:             fold_1(Fun, Line+1, Acc, Get);
  463:         {ok, <<"\n">>} -> %% Ignore empty lines
  464:             fold_1(Fun, Line+1, Acc, Get);
  465:         {ok, Data} ->
  466:             fold_1(Fun, Line+1, Fun(Data, Line, Acc), Get)
  467:     end.
